The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 February is 3,373,085 (5,992.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 28 January, there were 158,660 new confirmed cases (281.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 January, there were 228,034 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 30% (69,374 fewer cases).
